subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Mike Tranghese joined as the Big East’s first full-time employee in 1979, and has served as commissioner since his friend and mentor Dave Gavitt left in June 1990.
snippet: Mike Tranghese joined as the Big East’s first full-time employee in 1979, and has served as commissioner since his friend and mentor Dave Gavitt left in June 1990.
